mapper.insert: insert into orders (order_id, price_id, user_id, order_time, adt_psgnum, kid_psgnum, amount, statement) values (#{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{priceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adtPsgnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{kidPsgnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{amount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{statement,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update orders set price_id = #{priceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_time = #{orderTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, adt_psgnum = #{adtPsgnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, kid_psgnum = #{kidPsgnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, statement = #{statement,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select order_id, price_id, user_id, order_time, adt_psgnum, kid_psgnum, amount, statement from orders
select order_id, price_id, user_id, order_time, adt_psgnum, kid_psgnum, amount, statement from orders where user_id=#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
